gurmukhi: ਸਤਿਗੁਰ ਸਤਿ ਸਤਿਗੁਰ ਸਤਿ ਸਤਿ ਰਿਦੈ ਭਿਦੈ ਨ ਦੁਤੀਅਾ ਭਾੳੁ ਤ੍ਰਿਗੁਨ ਅਤੀਤ ਹੈ
transliteration: Satigur Sati Satigur Sati Sati Ridai , Bhidai N Douteeaa Bhaau Trigoun Ateet Hai ?
translation: True Guru has eternal form. His teachings are also for ever. He is never ridden with duality. He is free of the three traits of mammon (Tamas, Rajas and Saty).

gurmukhi: ਪੂਰਨ ਬ੍ਹਮ ਗੁਰ ਪੁਰਨ ਸਰਬਮੲੀ ੲੇਕ ਹੀ ਅਨੇਕ ਮੇਕ ਸਕਲ ਕੇ ਮੀਤ ਹੈ
transliteration: Pooran Braham Gur Puran Sarabamaee , Ayk Hee Anayk Mayk Sakal Kay Meet Hai ?
translation: Complete God Lord who is one and yet present in everyone, who is friend of everyone, manifests His form in True Guru, (Satguru).

gurmukhi: ਨਿਰਬੈਰ ਨਿਰਲੇਪ ਨਿਰਾਧਾਰ ਨਿਰਲੰਭ ਨਿਰੰਕਾਰ ਨਿਰਬਿਕਾਰ ਨਿਹਚਲ ਚੀਤ ਹੈ
transliteration: Nirabair Niralayp Niraadhaar Niralanbha , Nirankaar Nirabikaar Nihachal Cheet Hai ?
translation: God-like True Guru is free of all animosity. He is beyond the influence of maya (mammon). He requires nobody's support, nor takes anyone's refuge. He is formless, beyond the grip of five vices and is ever stable of mind.

gurmukhi: ਨਿਰਮਲ ਨਿਰਮੋਲ ਨਿਰੰਜਨ ਨਿਰਾਹਾਰ ਨਿਰਮੋਹ ਨਿਰਭੇਦ ਅਛਲ ਅਜੀਤ ਹੈ ||੧੫੦||
transliteration: Niramal Niramol Niranjan Niraahaara , Niramoh Nirabhayd Achhal Ajeet Hai ?150?
translation: God-like True Guru is free of dross. He cannot be evaluated. He is beyond the smudge of maya (mammon). He is free of all bodily needs like food and sleep etc; He has no attachment with anyone and is free of all differences. He tricks no one, nor can be tr
